about_the_game: Get up to 200 Projects in your Ohm Studio account!
detailed_description: Get up to 200 Projects in your Ohm Studio account!
legal_notice: Copyright © 2013 Ohm Force — In order to use Ohm Studio, Users must indicate that they have read and agreed to the Terms of Use.

mac_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: MacOS 10.5.8
  • Processor: Intel Processor
  • Memory: 2 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Integrated Intel graphics
  • Storage: 1 GB available space
  • Sound Card: Integrated sound card
  • Additional Notes: (disk space depends on how many projects you make)
mac_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS: MacOS 10.5.8 or later
  • Processor: Intel Processor
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Original graphic card or better
  • Network: Broadband Internet connection
  • Storage: 50 GB available space
  • Sound Card: CoreAudio compatible sound card
  • Additional Notes: (disk space depends on how many projects you make)

name: Ohm Cloud

package_groups.description: Get up to 200 Projects in your Ohm Studio account!  To be billed on a recurring basis.
package_groups.name: default

subs.option_description: $9.99 at checkout, auto-renewed every 1 month(s) at $9.99.
$24.99 at checkout, auto-renewed every 3 month(s) at $24.99.
$89.99 at checkout, auto-renewed every 12 month(s) at $89.99.

package_groups.title: Buy Ohm Cloud

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS *: Windows XP Service Pack 2
  • Processor: Pentium 4 or Athlon 64
  • Memory: 2 GB RAM
  • Graphics: 9 years old graphic card
  • DirectX: Version 9.0c
  • Network: Broadband Internet connection
  • Storage: 1 GB available space
  • Sound Card: DirectX/MME compatible sound card
  • Additional Notes: (disk space depends on how many projects you make)
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS *: Windows 7
  • Processor: Pentium 4 or Athlon 64
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: 3 years old graphic card or better
  • DirectX: Version 9.0c
  • Network: Broadband Internet connection
  • Storage: 50 GB available space
  • Sound Card: ASIO compatible sound card
  • Additional Notes: (disk space depends on how many projects you make)

price_overview.recurring_sub_desc: $9.99 at checkout, auto-renewed every 1 month(s) at $9.99.

reviews:
